headline: If I Had To Choose Just 1 REIT, It Would Be Alexandria Real Estate
summary: Alexandria Real Estate (ARE) offers strong fundamentals, a 7.8x P/FFO discount, stable FFO growth, and a compelling risk-adjusted yield. See more here.
